0.post_text:
Congratulations to the grand prize winner of the BMW X2 Hunt! The winner walked away with an exclusive BMW X2 Driving Experience for 2 in Munich, Germany. 

Missed the activities today? You can still try out the Spartan challenges and enjoy delectable treats with your family at Performance Motors tomorrow (22 April).

Plus, drive home your BMW X2 with launch exclusives that include BMW Service Inclusive for 5 years and BMW Extended Warranty for 5 years.

#SpartanSG #BMWX2 #OnTheHunt
0.story: BMW Singapore added 20 new photos — at BMW Singapore.

1.post_text: A big congratulations to our BMW X2 Hunt winner, Mr Chieng, who will walk away with an exclusive BMW X2 Driving Experience for 2 in Munich, Germany. Catch the prize unlocking here.

comments.message: It was a fun day. Thanks for the excitement Performance Motors!

3.post_text:
Unleash your inner rebel with the First-ever BMW X2, a Sports Activity Coupé that is ready to go beyond the everyday commute and get adventurous. 

Enjoy launch exclusives*, which include the BMW Service Inclusive for 5 years and BMW Extended Warranty for 5 years, when you drive home your BMW X2 at Performance Motors this weekend. Visit 303 Alexandra Road or call 6653 8051 to find out more.
 
*Terms and Conditions apply.

4.post_text:
Packed with power normally reserved for the track, BMW M gives you intensified driving pleasure. 

Experience our full range of BMW M models at Performance Munich Autos, and drive home your BMW M with exclusive BMW Service Inclusive Plus for 5 years and BMW Extended Warranty for 5 years this weekend.
4.story: BMW Singapore is at Performance Munich Autos.

5.post_text:
The BMW R 1200 GS/GSA – triumphant motorcycles from BMW Motorrad that need no introduction. With legendary robustness and progressive dynamics, these models ensure you conquer any terrains with ease and precision. To sweeten your ride, the BMW R 1200 GS/GSA now come with Akrapovič exhaust system, BMW Motorrad Navigator, and two side panniers. Adventure is calling, don’t hesitate. Make Life a Ride. 

Call 6319 0510 or visit our showroom at 315 Alexandra Road to find out more. While stocks last. Terms and conditions apply.

(Photo credit: YemPaul Antonio)

5.story: BMW Singapore is with Meysin Shin.

6.post_text: The BMW G310GS was launched on 7-8 April 2018 with the first-ever Grand Slam Sunday and Camp Muck Rush. Participants enjoyed exhilarating adventure test rides which allowed them to push their boundaries in a natural terrain which brought out the best that BMW Motorrad has to offer. We thank you for the support shown at both events and here’s to more adventures ahead. #MakeLifeaRide

7.post_text:
An especially dazzling appearance for your car – and for you. Treat your BMW to high-quality BMW Premium Car Care products.

Shop now on the PML Online Shop: https://shop.pml-bmw.com.sg/car-care-products-promotion-until-31st-may 

You can also enjoy these car care deals at 303 Alexandra Road. Promotion is valid till 31 May 2018.

8.post_text:
Missed us at Chevron House? 

To find out more about the First-ever BMW X2 and how to win an exclusive BMW X2 Driving Experience for 2 in Munich, Germany, visit http://bit.ly/2HKmDTs now! Registration for the BMW X2 Hunt closes today, 15 April, so hurry! Be #OnTheHunt

11.post_text:
For a limited time only, visit our showroom for special prices on our demo motorcycles. For fans of our GS models, heighten your riding experience with our new BMW R 1200 GS / GS Adventure motorcycles now packaged with Akrapovič exhaust system, BMW Motorrad Navigator, and two side panniers. Get ready to conquer the terrains.

Make Life a Ride.
 
Call 6319 0510 or make your way down to 315 Alexandra Road to find out more. 

While stocks last. Terms and conditions apply.

12.post_text: Calling all hunters to Chevron House today, 7.30am – 7.30pm! It is your final chance to score a BMW X2 FastPass that may well be your winning edge. So hurry down in your workout gear and be rewarded. Stay #OnTheHunt at http://bit.ly/2HKmDTs and stand to win an exclusive BMW X2 Driving Experience for 2 in Munich, Germany.

13.post_text: Yet to check out the First-ever BMW X2? The final mystery showcase is happening right now at Chevron House and these exciting challenges await you! Be #OnTheHunt now at http://bit.ly/2HKmDTs and stand to win an exclusive BMW X2 Driving Experience for 2 in Munich, Germany.

14.post_text:
Stay #OnTheHunt and meet us here in your workout gear on 12 and 13 April, from 7.30am –7.30pm. Conquer the Spartan challenges to receive exciting giveaways, including a BMW X2 Hunt FastPass that gives you an edge over the other hunters.

Join the BMW X2 Hunt now: http://bit.ly/2HKmDTs
